channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: More flytipping in the bus stop, 9th May
item.description:
Flytipping in the bus stop on village road outside the independent living centre.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Village Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Road Markings problem, 9th May
item.description:
28 day with road closure needed please refresh give way markings appropriately 18 meters best out of hours (Faded Road Markings)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 9th May
item.description:
Customer reporting having lost wing mirror on HGV due to vehicle having struck one of 3 branches of 6" circumference. Tree appears to have toppled, with branches protruding onto carriageway.
Report on FixMyStreet
